[ library(ic_gap_sbds) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

sbds_indomain(?Var)

Instantiate an integer SBDS variable to an element of its domain
Var
The (integer) SBDS variable to instantiate, or an integer

Description

Like indomain/1, but uses sbds_try/2 to do the instantiation so that the SBDS algorithms are invoked appropriately.

See Also

fd : indomain / 1, ic : indomain / 1, ic_symbolic : indomain / 1, sbds_try / 2, sbds_labeling / 1
